title: UN creates Artificial Intelligence advisory panel
description: UN General Assembly creates AI advisory body to address concerns about technology's impact on democracy and human rights.
content:
The UN General Assembly on Tuesday (August 26, 2025) created an Artificial Intelligence (AI) advisory body to help countries make decisions about the revolutionary technology.

title: Vesalius: Harnessing artificial intelligence to decode cancer tissue architecture
description: Researchers at VCU Massey Comprehensive Cancer Center have developed a new computational tool called Vesalius, which could help clinicians understand the complex relationships between cancer cells and their surrounding cells, leading to potential discoveries regarding the development of hard-to-treat cancers.

title: Study says AI chatbots need to fix suicide response, as family sues over ChatGPT role in boy's death
description: A study of how three popular artificial intelligence chatbots respond to queries about suicide found that they generally avoid answering questions that pose the highest risk to the user, such as for specific how-to guidance.
content:
EDITOR’S NOTE This story includes discussion of suicide. If you or someone you know needs help, the national suicide crisis helpline in Canada is available by calling or texting 988.

title: Study says AI chatbots need to fix suicide response, as family sues over ChatGPT role in boy's death
description: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — A study of how three popular artificial intelligence chatbots respond to queries about suicide found that they generally avoid answering questions that pose the highest risk to the user, such as for specific how-to guidance.
